A science podcast by real scientists

Welcome to Paper Boys, the podcast where we unravel the research papers behind the latest headlines in science news. Every Thursday, PhD students James and Charlie use their knack for understanding dense journal papers to bring you the actual science you've been glimpsing in the headlines.
